4319240.name: Final Flavor
4319240.description:
Settle on a dungeon brimming with adventure, mysteries, monsters, and... delicious food?!

Final Flavor is a 3D, first-person dungeon-crawling RPG in which you need to cook legendary recipes using fantastical ingredients such as slime nucleus, fungal broth, spiky tail, and many more! All the while trying to create a harmonious coexistence between your party of outcasts and this arcane environment.

Will you be able to establish a home and live exclusively off the dungeon's resources? Play and find out!
4319240.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
